Description:
Indicates suspicious rules such as an inbox rule that forwards a copy of all emails to an external address

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Inbox Forwarding Identity Protection
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'suspiciousinboxforwarding'
